title: Frank McGuire MP
subtitle: Delighted children, families and teachers at Holy Child primary school in Dallas celebrate $700,000 funding from the Andrews Labor Govt. New $2 million buildings will help children in need. Many are refugees from wars in Iraq and Syria. #auspol #vicpol #springstpic.twitter.com/yWchSOP3mE

title: Dil Khosa
subtitle: This is amazing! The untapped talent of former refugees and I am just awe inspired always pic.twitter.com/aIJDrulVuD

title: Dr Stephen Clarke
subtitle: #OTD 75 years ago (31 Oct 1944) PM Peter Fraser welcomes over 800 Polish refugee children and carers to New Zealand. Next day trained to new home at Pahīatua’s ‘Little Poland’ camp. (John Pascoe) For moving footage see 1967 film https://www.nzonscreen.com/title/the-story-of-seven-hundred-polish-children-1966 … #Poland #NewZealand pic.twitter.com/jOkCcGqU4H

title: cohealth
subtitle: Our Shared Humanity, a collection of 20 creative works by artists from refugee and asylum seeker backgrounds will be on exhibition during #OneNightInFootscray. More information > http://bit.ly/oursharedhumanity …pic.twitter.com/B7b5oCvnUF

title: East Asia Forum
subtitle: Bangladesh is in an untenable position caught between its neighbours majoritarian impulses. Bangladesh continues to host a large Rohingya refugee population from Myanmar while India threatens to deport Bengali Muslims from Assam #Bangladesh #Myanmar #India https://buff.ly/2Qd2a12 pic.twitter.com/OfbpACRUqe

title: UniSA Mental Health
subtitle:
FREE one hour webinar tomorrow afternoon on best practice #traumainformed perspectives in #SuicidePrevention - including discussion of #refugee and #AsylumSeeker #trauma. 

Brought to you by @LifeinMindAU 

Register at https://everymind.org.au/events/event/5038 …pic.twitter.com/4J5asmgTqc

title: Evergreen Donation
subtitle: This could be your last chance to give a warm blanket to a freezing Rohingyan refugee. We will be departing on 15th Nov to distribute blankets to the adults and sweaters to the children in the chilly Rohingyan camps and remote villages of Bangladesh. Please dig deep. pic.twitter.com/mtUFIgSn5w

title: #SpecFic #Writer
subtitle:
#RT @amnestyOz: RT @Shankabout: There is goodness in Bendigo. There is an eagerness and willingness to help resettle refugees, led by neighbourhoods...driven by community. 

#MyNewNeighbour @amnestyOzpic.twitter.com/uskOhcaoAQ

title: Swathi
subtitle: On relationships..."in some religions relationships are not allowed..but it's not just refugee and migrant communities...when we were in the refugee camp a nun helping my mum told her that kids shouldn't be in relationships and to not let us watch The Simpsons because it's rude" pic.twitter.com/mc8V2MLSPG

title: Aydan Greatrick
subtitle:
Excellent and challenging opening panel on erasure and silencing of LGBTQI refugees. So much to think about ahead of the two day #QueerDisplacements conference in Canberra.

Thanks @TNDixson + @Renee_Dixson for organising - very excited for the next two days.pic.twitter.com/7OaBFSosfp

title: Brad Chilcott
subtitle: Fantastic to be in Cork, Ireland with refugee advocates and settlement practitioners from around the world for @theGRSI Community Sponsorship Champions Summit. Great people from as far as Argentina, Brazil, NZ, Canada, US and all over Europe.pic.twitter.com/Bn9PBkNkxg

title: WEFTshop
subtitle:
What I love about our beautiful hand loomed Mie Meh Shawl is how they can be a light and soft shawl and then in the winter a rich full scarf. Only x4 of these beautiful pieces available woven by our talented artisans in Karenni refugee camp.
Limited edit… https://ift.tt/33GM5EE pic.twitter.com/Gh3rul1lzu

title: Martin O'Brien
subtitle: Winners!St Anthony’s take home Yr 5-6 Pairs gong @ #premierscodingchallenge. I mentored the Yr6 Ss on app design, UI & UX. One team member also from one of our Syrian refugee families - so proud of their grit & determination! #coding #educhat #AppleEDUchat #edtechpic.twitter.com/wQbx5Yu9TO – at Ferny Grove State High School

title: Better Hearing (VIC)
subtitle:
Last night, our Service Impact Lead, Jacqui, had the pleasure of attending the @ASRC1's event with Dr Mara Edelman on cross-cultural practice.

Donate now to our hearing aid bank for refugees and asylum seekers: https://bit.ly/2QbtuNa 
#morethanjustears #access #equitypic.twitter.com/L1R5FPo7vX
